settings.custom_liquid:
This is an archived product

It's either so unique it's never coming back into stock or extremely difficult to source - either way, it's on display so you can still enjoy seeing some of the incredible knives that have been made over time.

In the event we are able to get any more, we'll announce it via our newsletter so please subscribe to that for all stock updates

settings.marquee_text: This product is either no longer available or very difficult to restock and is displayed for historical purposes and to share great knives - If it ever comes back it'll be on our newsletter! Sign up for updates.

    Care Tip – Reactive Carbon Steel

    The core (and on some ranges, the cladding steel too) of this knife is made using a carbon steel which can react with moisture and acids in your food and so is not stainless or rust-proof.

    Read our carbon steel care guide

Product SKU: {% if current_variant.sku %}{{ current_variant.sku }}{% endif %}

Our aim is to measure and photograph our products as accurately as possible but due to many items being handmade, finished or using natural materials, there can be minor variance in measurements and things such as blade or wood finishes can vary. We will always endeavour to provide the most accurate measurements, photos and descriptions of our products.

Some measurements such as HRC are provided by manufacturers and should therefore be used as a guide.
